text:
@realDonaldTrump #Coronavirus #COVID19 
The W.H.O. has told you that this is not a regional virus.

#TruthMatters BIG donnie

Steven Miller -stop talking in the puppet's ear.
Steve Bannon -stop talking in the puppet's ear.

Jared Kushner -stop going to WH - you do NOT have security clearance
